summary: The true-life story of Darby Crash, who became an L.A. punk icon after getting kicked out of high school and forming The Germs with a collection of friends who have little experience with their instruments or playing music.
cast: Shane West|Rick Gonzalez|Bijou Phillips|Noah Segan|Tina Majorino|Katharine Leonard|Rachael Santhon|Ashton Holmes|Keir O'Donnell|Lauren German|Sebastian Roché|Amy Halloran|Missy Doty|Ray Park|Azura Skye|Michele Hicks|Paul Nygro|Chris Pontius|Ozzy Benn|Christopher Boyd|Kylan James|Randi Newton|Brian Oerly|Jared Show|Brian Gleason|J.P. Manoux|Rich Moreno|Sara Rivas|Richard Wharton|Howard S. Miller|Chad Liffmann|Noah Abrams|The Bronx|The Mae Shi|Jeff Gerhart|Anna Waronker|Chelsea Javier|Tarek Bishara|Shane Finkenkeller|Leslie Grossman|Graham Hart|Greg McWhorter|Lachlan McWhorter|Jonathan Milliken|Bru Muller|David Nichols Jr.|Trevor Parsons|Giddle Partridge|Peter Prins|Justin Sandler|Christian Schmook|Scott L. Schwartz|John Westernoff|Genoveva Winsen
title: What We Do Is Secret
